sub_title: Localization Project Manager and Italian translator
summary:
I am an Italian localization specialist who has always had an interest in foreign languages and cultures. 
I spent 7 years in the UK where I graduated in Language Studies, obtained the IOL Diploma in Public Service Interpreting (English/Spanish, legal option) and the certificate in Community Health Interpreting (English/Italian).
In 2002 I moved to the Netherlands where I currently live. Here I worked for 2 years as an in-house translator and proofreader for one of the leading manufacturers of connectivity products. After that, I worked for a year as a translation coordinator. From 2007 until 2022 I worked as a freelance translator and localization project manager. I am a member of the NGTV (Netherlands Association of Interpreters and Translators) and of MET (Mediterranean Editors and Translators).
Currently I work as localization project manager at The OS. If you need a translation into Italian or into other languages, you can get in touch with The OS and I'll take care of your localization project.
